name: Martin Septim
description: The illegitimate son of Emperor Uriel Septim VII and the last heir to the Septim Dynasty. A priest of Akatosh who becomes the Hero of Kvatch's ally in stopping the Oblivion Crisis.

name: Jauffre
description: Grandmaster of the Blades who protects Martin Septim and guides the Hero of Kvatch in their quest to stop the Oblivion Crisis.

name: Lucien Lachance
description: A Speaker of the Dark Brotherhood who recruits the player and serves as their primary contact with the organization.

name: Vicente Valtieri
description: An ancient vampire and member of the Dark Brotherhood who offers vampirism to the player.

name: Sheogorath
description: The Daedric Prince of Madness who rules over the Shivering Isles. He tasks the player with stopping the Greymarch.

name: Mankar Camoran
description: Leader of the Mythic Dawn cult responsible for assassinating Emperor Uriel Septim VII and opening the Oblivion Gates.

name: Uriel Septim VII
description: The Emperor of Tamriel at the start of the game. His assassination triggers the Oblivion Crisis.

name: Gray Fox
description: The legendary leader of the Thieves Guild, cursed by the Gray Cowl of Nocturnal.

name: Hannibal Traven
description: The Arch-Mage of the Mages Guild who banned necromancy from the Guild.

name: Mannimarco
description: The King of Worms, an ancient necromancer and enemy of the Mages Guild. Seeks revenge against Hannibal Traven.

name: Vilena Donton
description: The Master of the Fighters Guild who leads the organization against the Blackwood Company.

name: Baurus
description: A loyal Blade who served as bodyguard to Emperor Uriel Septim VII. He helps the player in the early main quest.

name: Glarthir
description: A paranoid citizen of Skingrad who believes people are conspiring against him.

name: Shady Sam
description: A black market dealer who sells skooma and lockpicks outside the Imperial City walls.

name: Janus Hassildor
description: The reclusive Count of Skingrad who hides his vampiric nature from his subjects.

name: Umbra
description: A warrior possessed by the legendary sword Umbra. Part of Clavicus Vile's Daedric quest.

name: M'aiq the Liar
description: A recurring character in The Elder Scrolls series who provides humorous commentary and false information.

name: Ocato
description: The High Chancellor of the Elder Council who helps lead Cyrodiil during the Oblivion Crisis.

name: Haskill
description: Sheogorath's loyal chamberlain and majordomo of the Shivering Isles.

name: Agronak gro-Malog
description: The Gray Prince, Grand Champion of the Arena. His tragic story is revealed through a side quest.

name: Raminus Polus
description: Master Wizard at the Arcane University who assigns tasks to new Mages Guild members.

name: Modryn Oreyn
description: Second-in-command of the Fighters Guild who leads the fight against the Blackwood Company.

name: Arquen
description: A high-ranking member of the Thieves Guild who provides guidance to the player.

name: Adoring Fan
description: An overly enthusiastic fan who follows the player after they become Arena Grand Champion.

name: Dagon
description: Mehrunes Dagon, the Daedric Prince of Destruction who attempts to invade Tamriel during the Oblivion Crisis.
